attributes.action: Stop swearing in popular music be it rap/r&b/dance or any other genre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ok, so everybody swears? maybe? but i dont want my kids to be subjected to pop music with swearing in it, ok they words are dubbed / bleeped out, but thats not the point. only the other day, my 9 yr old came up to me and asked what the "blank" was in a "pink2 song. not a nice experiance at all. And no, i am not some old fuddy duddy, (36)so please sign this petition, and stamp out this ever increasing trend of swearing in pop / rap / r&b / dance music.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
